title: NEB Expressions 2021, Issue 3
author: New England Biolabs
description: The latest issue of NEB Expressions focuses on synthetic mRNA synthesis, our switch to Recombinant Albumin, and our dedicated GMP-grade facility.
cleaned_text: maintenance beginning Friday, September 8th, at 8pm ET and will last through Sunday, September 10th, at 2pm ET. If you experience an issue, please try again after the maintenance window. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience this may cause.
